shapingFuture.heading: Shaping the Future with Innovative Tech Solutions
shapingFuture.subheading: Discover how our cutting-edge technologies can transform your business and drive sustainable growth in the digital age.

ai.title: AI-Powered Solutions
ai.description: Enhance your business with our cutting-edge artificial intelligence tools that adapt to your needs.
ai.details: Our AI solutions help businesses automate processes, gain insights from data, and deliver personalized experiences to customers.

webDesign.title: Responsive Web Design
webDesign.description: Create stunning websites that work flawlessly across all devices and screen sizes.
webDesign.details: Our responsive design approach ensures your website delivers an optimal experience on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.

security.description: Protect your digital assets with our comprehensive security solutions and threat monitoring.
security.details: We implement advanced security measures to safeguard your data, applications, and infrastructure from evolving cyber threats.

cloud.title: Cloud Computing
cloud.description: Scale your business efficiently with our reliable cloud infrastructure and solutions.

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: Expand your digital presence to new markets with localized solutions and strategies.

analytics.title: Performance Analytics

hero.title: Elevate Your Brand, Craft Digital Success, Revolutionize Your Business – One Click at a Time.
hero.description: Aurum Tech is your ideal partner in transforming your business ideas into a successful digital reality. We offer comprehensive solutions to help merchants and brand owners create professional online stores and websites, design innovative logos for brands, and develop engaging social media content. We help you build a strong online presence and elevate your brand to achieve sustainable growth and increase your sales.

digitalGrowth.title: Empowering Your Digital Growth
digitalGrowth.description: At AURUM TECH, we don't just offer services – we fuel your business growth through impactful digital solutions that are designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Our goal is to drive measurable success, increase efficiency, and enable you to stay ahead in the competitive digital landscape.

transformation.title: Digital Transformation That Delivers Results
transformation.description: Rather than simply providing technical solutions, we focus on transforming your business. By leveraging innovative technology and strategic planning, we help your brand thrive in the digital era.

webSolutions.description: We create websites that are built for performance and user engagement, ensuring that your business stands out and your audience stays connected.
points: Enhanced user experience for better engagement
Faster load times that lead to better conversion rates

points: Effortless content management for time savings
Customizable to meet the unique needs of your business

opportunities.title: Endless Opportunities for Growth
opportunities.description: We are not just about services; we are about unlocking new opportunities for your business to grow and evolve. Whether it's through better data insights, enhanced user experiences, or smarter digital strategies, we aim to provide you with measurable outcomes.

globalPresence.title: Our Global Presence
globalPresence.description: At AURUM TECH, we are a fully remote, online-first company that operates globally, providing exceptional digital solutions to businesses across the Middle East, Europe, and beyond. No matter where you are, we are just a click away to help you elevate your brand and achieve your goals.

globalPresence.footer: Whether you're based in the heart of the Middle East, the European Union, or any other region, AURUM TECH is here to support your business with tailored digital solutions that ensure your success in the digital landscape.

pageIntro.title: Driven by Innovation, United by Purpose
pageIntro.description: At AURUM TECH, we believe collaboration fuels creativity — and creativity drives results. We place our clients at the heart of every project, building digital solutions that are tailored, scalable, and future-focused.

history.foundingMission: Founded with a mission to bridge the gap between businesses and smart technology, AURUM TECH operates as a fully online agency serving clients across the Arab world and Europe. Our diverse, passionate team brings together developers, designers, marketers, and strategists — all working remotely, seamlessly, and efficiently.
history.buildingExperiences: We don't just build websites; we build experiences, foster connections, and empower brands to thrive in the digital era.

culture.title: Balance your passion with your passion for life.
culture.description: At AURUM TECH, we believe that great work starts with a great culture. We're a remote-first team of passionate creatives, developers, and strategists who thrive on flexibility, mutual respect, and shared vision.

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: We encourage continuous learning and professional development to help our team evolve with technology.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: Our remote setup is built on accountability and results — we trust our team to deliver without micromanagement.

empathy.title: Empathy
empathy.description: We value each individual's well-being and maintain a supportive environment that respects personal boundaries and work-life balance.

inspirationalPhrases: Whether you're coding from Cairo or designing from Paris, you'll feel connected, valued, and empowered.
From Riyadh to Rome — our culture travels beyond borders.
Work remotely, collaborate globally, grow continuously.
At AURUM TECH, your passion drives our innovation.
We don't just work online — we thrive online.
Creativity knows no timezone at AURUM TECH.

pageIntro.title: Your Vision, Our Expertise
pageIntro.description: At AURUM TECH, we don't just build websites – we craft digital experiences that make a difference. We specialize in creating personalized, cutting-edge solutions that align with your business goals and provide lasting value.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: We believe in a holistic approach that puts your business needs at the center, creating solutions that are not just visually stunning but strategically sound.

understanding.title: Understanding Your Needs
understanding.description: We start by diving deep into your business and understanding your unique challenges and objectives. This helps us create a roadmap that aligns with your vision.

design.title: Creative & Functional Design
design.description: Our expert designers create intuitive, visually appealing interfaces, while our developers build the robust technical foundations that bring your ideas to life.

service.title: End-to-End Service
service.description: From initial concept to final delivery, we handle everything to ensure a smooth and efficient experience, offering continuous support along the way.

customerCentric.title: Customer-Centric
customerCentric.description: We prioritize your goals and work closely with you, ensuring that the solutions we build are tailored to your needs and deliver real value.

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: Our team consists of passionate designers, developers, and strategists, each bringing expertise and creativity to every project.

innovativeTech.title: Innovative Technology
innovativeTech.description: We use the latest tools and technologies to ensure that your project is not only modern but scalable and ready for the future.

cta.title: Let's Bring Your Ideas to Life
cta.description: Ready to start your digital journey? Reach out to us today and let's collaborate to create something exceptional that stands out in the digital world.

pageIntro.title: Frequently Asked Questions
pageIntro.description: Find answers to common questions about our services, processes, and support. If you don't see your question here, feel free to reach out to our team directly.

services.question: What services does AURUM TECH offer?
services.answer: We offer a comprehensive range of digital services including website development, e-commerce solutions, social media marketing, content creation, digital consulting, and brand identity design. Each service is tailored to meet your specific business needs and goals.

timeline.question: How long does it take to develop a website?
timeline.answer: Our services typically take 2-4 weeks for a standard website and 4-8 weeks for a complex e-commerce platform. We'll provide you with a specific timeline during our initial consultation.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept multiple payment methods including credit cards, bank transfers, and PayPal. We typically work with a 50% upfront deposit to begin work, with the remaining balance due upon project completion. For larger projects, we can arrange milestone-based payment schedules.

maintenance.question: Do you offer website maintenance after launch?
maintenance.answer: Yes, we offer ongoing website maintenance and support packages to keep your site secure, updated, and performing optimally. Our maintenance packages include regular updates, security monitoring, performance optimization, and technical support.

revisions.question: How do you handle revisions to the work?
revisions.answer: We include a specific number of revision rounds in each project proposal. For most projects, we include 2-3 rounds of revisions. Additional revisions beyond the included amount are billed at our standard hourly rate. We always work closely with you to ensure you're satisfied with the final product.

support.question: What kind of support do you provide?
support.answer: We provide comprehensive support through multiple channels including email, phone, and WhatsApp. Our standard support hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM (GMT+3). For clients with maintenance packages, we also offer emergency support for critical issues.

guarantees.question: Do you offer any guarantees for your work?
guarantees.answer: Yes, we stand behind our work with a satisfaction guarantee. If any aspect of our deliverables doesn't match what was agreed upon in the project scope, we'll make the necessary adjustments at no additional cost. We also provide a 30-day warranty period after project completion to address any issues that might arise.

getStarted.question: How do we get started working together?
getStarted.answer: Getting started is easy! Simply contact us through our website or send us a message on WhatsApp. We'll schedule an initial consultation to discuss your project needs, goals, and timeline. After the consultation, we'll provide a detailed proposal and quote for your project.

pageIntro.title: Privacy Policy
pageIntro.intro: At AURUM TECH, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

dataCollection.title: What Personal Data We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We may collect the following types of personal information:
items: Contact Information: Name, email address, phone number, and business address.
Account Information: Username, password, and account preferences.
Technical Information: IP address, browser type, device information, pages visited, and time spent on our website.
Communication Data: Copies of emails, messages, or other communications you have with us.
Project Information: Details about your projects, requirements, and preferences.
Business Data: Commercial registration number (CR), IBAN, financial account details, social media credentials, website URL, and other data based on the agreement between us and the client.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.intro: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
items: To provide and maintain our services
To communicate with you about our services, updates, and offers
To personalize your experience on our website
To improve our website and services
To respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
To process transactions and manage your account
To comply with legal obligations
dataUsage.retention: We will only retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.para1: We may use third-party services to help us operate our website and deliver our services. These third parties may have access to your personal information only to perform specific tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.
thirdParty.para2: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these websites. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of every website you visit.
thirdParty.intro: Third-party services we may use include:
items: Google Analytics (for website analytics)
Payment processors (for handling transactions)
Email marketing services (for newsletters and communications)
Cloud hosting providers (for website hosting and storage)
Customer relationship management (CRM) systems

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:
items: Access: You have the right to request copies of your personal information.
Rectification: You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate or complete information you believe is incomplete.
Erasure: You have the right to request that we erase your personal information under certain conditions.
Restriction: You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal information under certain conditions.
Data Portability: You have the right to request that we transfer the data we have collected to another organization or directly to you under certain conditions.
Objection: You have the right to object to our processing of your personal information under certain conditions.
rights.exercise: If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

security.title: Data Security
security.para1: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
security.para2: We regularly review our information collection, storage, and processing practices to protect against unauthorized access to our systems.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.para1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
changes.para2: We recommend that you review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

pageIntro.title: Terms of Service
pageIntro.intro: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using the AURUM TECH website or services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.para1: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the AURUM TECH website, products, and services ("Services"). By accessing or using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy.
introduction.para2: "AURUM TECH," "we," "us," and "our" refer to AURUM TECH and its subsidiaries, affiliates, officers, directors, employees, agents, and contractors. "You" and "your" refer to the individual or entity using our Services.
introduction.para3: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of any material changes by posting the updated Terms on our website. Your continued use of our Services after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the modified Terms.

userObligations.title: 2. User Obligations
userObligations.intro: By using our Services, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate and complete information when registering for our Services or communicating with us.
Maintain the security and confidentiality of any passwords or access credentials associated with your account.
Use our Services in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.
Not use our Services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
Not attempt to probe, scan, or test the vulnerability of our systems or networks.
Not interfere with or disrupt the integrity or performance of our Services or the data contained therein.
Provide all necessary materials, approvals, and feedback in a timely manner as required for the completion of your project.

paymentTerms.title: 3. Payment Terms
paymentTerms.intro: Payment terms for our Services are as follows:
items: A 50% non-refundable deposit is required to begin work on your project, which is refundable only if the project has not started. Once the project begins, this deposit becomes non-refundable.
The remaining 50% balance is due upon project completion.

Payments must be made in USD. If the client is unable to pay in USD, we can arrange an alternative payment method in the local currency if we have accounts in the client's country. Otherwise, payments should be made through the CEO in Egypt via a bank transfer in either Egyptian Pounds (EGP) or USD.
All payments must be received before project delivery.
All fees are exclusive of taxes, which will be added to invoices where applicable.
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate services if payments are not received on time according to the agreed schedule.

intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.intro: Intellectual property rights are handled as follows:
items: AURUM TECH retains ownership of all intellectual property rights in our Services, including but not limited to software, designs, code, and methodologies that are not specifically created for you.
Upon receipt of full payment, you will receive ownership rights to the final deliverables created specifically for your project, as detailed in the project proposal.
We retain the right to display and use your project as part of our portfolio and marketing materials, unless otherwise agreed in writing.
You retain ownership of all materials, content, and intellectual property you provide to us in connection with your project.
intellectualProperty.indemnity: You agree to indemnify and hold AURUM TECH harmless from any claims, damages, or liabilities arising from content or materials you provide to us.

termination.title: 5. Termination Policy
termination.intro: Either party may terminate the service agreement under the following conditions:
items: You may terminate the agreement at any time by providing written notice. In such cases, you will be responsible for paying for all services rendered up to the termination date, and no refund will be issued for the initial deposit.
AURUM TECH may terminate the agreement if you breach any of these Terms and fail to cure such breach within 15 days of receiving notice.

We reserve the right to terminate the agreement if we determine, in our sole discretion, that your project requirements have significantly changed from the original scope, making it impossible or impractical to complete the project as originally agreed.
termination.rights: Upon termination, you will be provided with all completed work for which you have paid, and all rights and obligations of both parties under these Terms will terminate except those which by their nature survive termination.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.intro: To the maximum extent permitted by law, AURUM TECH shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses resulting from:
items: Your use or inability to use our Services.
Any unauthorized access to or use of our servers and/or any personal information stored therein.
Any interruption or cessation of transmission to or from our Services.
Any bugs, viruses, trojan horses, or the like that may be transmitted to or through our Services by any third party.
liability.limit: In no event shall our total liability to you for all claims exceed the amount paid by you to AURUM TECH for the Services giving rise to the claim.

governingLaw.title: 7. Governing Law
governingLaw.text: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the applicable laws, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any legal action or proceeding arising out of or relating to these Terms shall be brought exclusively in the courts of the jurisdiction where the company is registered, and you consent to the personal jurisdiction of such courts.

contact.title: 8. Contact Information
contact.intro: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:
